entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 14 by morning. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
